SELECT /* HRML0030P01.SEARCH00.연봉계약서확인 조회 */ A.EMPL_NUMB AS EMPL_NUMB /* 사원번호 */ , SF_GET_EMPLNAME(A.EMPL_NUMB) AS EMPL_NAME /* 사원명 */ , A.CNTR_YMTH AS CNTR_YMTH /* 계약년월 */ , A.CNTD_CODE AS CNTD_CODE /* 계약구분 */ , A.DEPT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE /* 부서코드 */ , SF_GET_DEPTNAME(A.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_NAME /* 부서명 */ , A.DURS_CODE AS DURS_CODE /* 직책코드 */ , A.OPOS_CODE AS OPOS_CODE /* 직위코드 */ , SF_GET_COMMNAME('OPOS_CODE', A.OPOS_CODE) AS OPOS_NAME /* 직위명 */ , A.CNTR_BEDE AS CNTR_BEDE /* 계약시작일 */ , A.CNTR_ENDD AS CNTR_ENDD /* 계약종료일 */ , A.BSLY_AMOT AS BSLY_AMOT /* 기본급금액 */ , A.OVER_AMOT AS OVER_AMOT /* 초과근무금액 */ , A.MTPY_AMOT AS MTPY_AMOT /* 월지급액 */ , A.PBNR_YSNO AS PBNR_YSNO /* 수습여부 */ , A.PBNR_ENDD AS PBNR_ENDD /* 수습급여종료일 */ , A.PBN1_AMOT AS PBN1_AMOT /* 수습1월월봉 */ , A.PBN2_AMOT AS PBN2_AMOT /* 수습2월월봉 */ , A.PBN3_AMOT AS PBN3_AMOT /* 수습3월월봉 */ , A.YPAY_AMOT AS YPAY_AMOT /* 결정연봉액 */ , A.RCGN_YSNO AS RCGN_YSNO /* 승인여부 */ , A.REMK_100X AS REMK_100X /* 비고100 */ , A.CNCF_YSNO AS CNCF_YSNO /* 계약확인여부 */ , A.CNCF_DATE AS CNCF_DATE /* 계약확인일시 */ , A.OWNR_NAME AS OWNR_NAME /* 대표자성명 */ FROM HR_CNTRXA A /* [근로연봉계약] */
A.EMPL_NUMB = #EMPL_NUMB# /* 사원번호 */
A.CNTR_YMTH = #CNTR_YMTH# /* 계약년월 */
ORDER BY A.EMPL_NUMB
